name: Spaceship Racers
description:
Game made in about 1999 or 98 using Visual Basic 6

This game is a simple 'click the mouse buttons as fast you can' game. You control the grey spaceship and you have to make it to the finish line before the brown spaceship. Choose the speed the brown spaceship moves at and then click both mouse buttons as fast as you can - the faster you click the faster your spaceship moves.
